name: BKTHat Standard Small Allover Panels - Women's

features: Lightweight, fast-drying performance-ready COOLwick™ fabric and repreve recycled performance fiber
UPF +50 protection on the brim and body
Soft360 pliable brim for easy packability
Reflective detailing on the front and back for night run visibility
6 panel fit. 2 sizes S/M 56.5 cm. L/XL 60 cm. Adjustable. See size guide
